A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this new addition to the Star Wars franchise. I thought Luke's story and ending was partiuclarly fitting and the film presented many 'kickass' moments. There was lots of space fighting which for me was ace! There were weird bits that needed explaining not to mention who the fuck Snoke is. Overall a great movie. It pisses me off when people say it was rubbish. NO STAR WARS FILM IS RUBBISH and should be rated 57%. Just some are better than others. I feel this was better than most
